Nerangs.ab: pas digar haft šāḫ-e hum ke az gere tā gere yek-šāḫ ast pas xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vōhū se guftan frauuarāne gāh ānče bid haomahe aṣ̌auua.zaŋhō xšnaoθra. y. v. x. f. yaϑā ahū vairiiō zaotā frā mē mrūtē OD mraotū

"Then, again the seven hum-twigs. (One twig) is what (goes) from one knot to another knot. Then (he should recite) xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ and three Aṣ̌əm Vohūs and the Frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh and (with the šnūman) haomahe aṣ̌auua.zaŋhō xšnaoθra y. v. x. f. (and with the wāz-gīrišnīh) yaϑā ahū vairiiō zaotā frā mē mrūtē until mraotū"
ke hum šuyid ḫšnutra ahurahe mazdā ašem vohi se bār fravarāne če gāh dārid haōmahe aṣ̌auuazaŋhō xšnaōθra yasnāica v. x. f. yaθā ahī vairiiō zaōtā tā sar u-š wāz vāǧ frāǧ girešn

"When one washes the hum, (he should recite) xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ and three Aṣ̌əm Vohūs and the Frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh (and with the šnūman) haomahe aṣ̌auua.zaŋhō xšnaoθra. y. v. x. f. (and with the wāz-gīrišnīh) yaϑā ahū vairiiō zaotā frā mē mrūtē until the end. He has to take the vāǧ."
